attributes.action: prohibit muslims, jews, hindus, buddhists and people from all other religions from becoming, or marrying, a monarch.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present, the laws of the land prohibit a Catholic from ever becoming or marrying a monarch. Obviously they also prohibit a monarch from ever becoming or marrying a Catholic. This seems discriminatory, in that it singles out just one religion.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
